name: Программист-разработчик (AI, Big Data)
description:
РЕЗЮМЕ РАССМАТРИВАЮТСЯ ТОЛЬКО НА АНГЛИЙСКОМ ЯЗЫКЕ

Внимание: работа с переездом в Республику Корея.

PLEASE SEND YOUR ENGLISH CV

Company Name: Thinkforbl Company

Thinkforbl is a software engineering consulting company.

Recently, they have been striving to secure AI smart livestock technology related to improvement the productivity of livestock(beef cow, dairy cow, pig) and disease detection and prevention.

Industry Type: Computer programming, consultancy and related activities

Position: Developer

Job Details:

For company's AI Development team the following skills are needed:

  • a Ph.D. recipient in the relevant field or associated certificate holder;

  • Experience in development in cloud service environments such as AWS / Azure / GCP;
  • Experience with Python, C/C++, or Java development;
  • Experience in AI engine development, AI algorithm, big data processing;
  • Experience in Unix/Linux environment, distributed or parallel systems, deep learning, machine learning;
  • High knowledge of data structure, algorithms, OOP, and design patterns;
  • Understanding, Analysis, Logic, Judgment, and Expression.
  • Skills in Design Patterns, Refactoring, and Unit Test Frameworks.
  • Knowledge of basic computer theories such as OS,Network, Data Structure, etc.
  • Practical skills in Quality and Testing or is willing to apply them.

Mandatory Qualifications:

  • Master's degree in Computer Science(AI, Big Data);
  • At least 3 years of experience;
  • English (Fluent).

Conditions:

  • Working Days: 5 days per week.
  • Working Hours: 8 hours per day.
  • Working Place (Location): South Korea, Seoul.
  • Annual salary: from 25 000 - 53 000 USD.
  • The Term of Contract: 12 months (possible to discuss the period).
  • Insurance is provided.
